subject: subject number
blurred: 1 if presented in degraded state, 0 if presented in clear state
resp: 1 if subject reponse was "animate", 0 if response was "inanimate", -1 for "no response"
rt: Reaction time (seconds) from stimulus onset, -1 for no response
correct: 1 if correct, 0 if incorrect (or no response)
stimon: stimulus onset (seconds) relative to experiment start
stimoff: stimulus offset (seconds) relative to experiment start
